name: Cherufe
description: The Cherufe is a large elemental creature, embodying the raw power of magma with a chaotic design that radiates a fierce, fiery presence.
memorable: Its ability to create fissures and trigger ground quakes makes the Cherufe a unique and terrifying opponent in battle.
goals: The Cherufe typically seeks to engage in destructive combat and utilize its magma-related abilities to dominate battlefield situations.
relations: Cherufes may be encountered alongside other fire elementals or creatures that thrive in volcanic environments.
environment: Often found in volcanic areas and regions with abundant magma.
strengths: Immunities to fire and poison, and resistance to nonmagical physical damage make it very durable in combat.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence scores hinder its agility and cunning.
attacks: Can unleash multiple powerful slam attacks or hurl magma balls from a distance, combining bludgeoning and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Quake ability creates tremors around it, dealing massive damage and knocking enemies prone.
senses: The Cherufe has tremorsense up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even while underground.
skills: It has proficient perception skills with a +7 bonus, providing good awareness during encounters.
additional_information: Utilizes the Firewalker ability to double speed when hit by fire damage.
Internal Flame ability deters melee combat by punishing attackers with fire damage.
Creates fissures that can trap enemies and destabilize structures.
Can use its surroundings to control the battlefield effectively.
High Strength and Constitution make it a powerful melee combatant.
test_queries: massive magma elemental with quake ability
elemental that creates fissures in the ground
chaotic evil elemental using magma attacks
